product_name: Granite Gear Ultralight Pack Hipbelt - Men's
long_description: The Granite Gear Ultralight pack hipbelt comes standard on Nimbus packs, providing light comfort when carrying loads up to 35 lbs. Hipbelt also works with Blaze A.C. 60 and Leopard A.C. 58 packs. Hipbelt boasts a single pivot-point connection, hip stabilizers, dual-density foam and stretch woven fabric. Note: the Granite Gear Ultralight pack hipbelt is not compatible with Crown V.C. 60 or Leopard V.C. 46 packs.
short_description: The Granite Gear Ultralight pack hipbelt comes standard on Nimbus packs, providing light comfort when carrying loads up to 35 lbs. Hipbelt also works with Blaze A.C. 60 and Leopard A.C. 58 packs.
